title: Platform Model
description: A standardized manufactured design of an observation platform, such as an Argo float model, glider type, or buoy type.

id.description: Internal identifier for the platform model.

name.description: The common name of the platform model (e.g., APEX, SVP-B).

description.description: Textual description of the model's design or purpose.

type.description: The broader platform type this model belongs to (e.g., Float, Wave Glider, or Tide Guage).

manufacturer.description: The organization that manufactures this platform model.
